question: What Dua to read after Ghusl?
answer:
QUESTION

can u plz tel me wat to read  in ghusul after intercourse for a women...

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh  

 

There is nothing stipulated to recite at the time of ghusl after intercourse.

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla knows best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum




Mufti Ebrahim Desai
